website_summaries.verdict: A basic underwear to catch wetness for older children and adults.
pros: Does a good job of fitting slimmer figures
Has some breathability to the material, which seems to keep wearers from overheating that can be problematic in other brands
cons: While this brand does run a little small, it does not come in a youth size

customer_reviews.title: is a bit of joy. I had been using Depends
customer_reviews.text: I'm a caretaker for my mother, as difficult as dealing with her and her illness is.. finding a product that solves a problem, is a bit of joy. I had been using Depends, which fell apart and didn't fit her right at all, and they were about 2 dollars more a pack. THESE ARE SO MUCH BETTER... I'm washign laundry a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Parris

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Okay Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought same brand provided in physical rehabilitation facility. They fit. They're comfortable. They don't leak and the profile is low enough that under normal clothing (seriously, not under yoga pants). Really can't ask for much more. Keep an eye on the prices for some reason they fluctuate wildly. A few days after ordering, with Prime shipping, another non Prime seller had them at half the price I paid but only for about 36 hours then it jumped back up again
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Prevail Disposable Briefs...a No Return item on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We just used these for my 96 yo Mom. We ususally buy Depends, CVS store brand or Walmart store brand. Thought that we would try ordering from Amazon to make life a little easier for us. These Prevail diapers are AWFUL! They are flimsy and are not at all absorbent and when they do get wet they disintegrate. It's like wearing a sheet of toilet paper. Will never buy these again. Wish I could have returned them but Amazon does not allow returns of this item. What a waste!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epic Fail
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I got these for my mother who suffered a stroke a number of years ago. She is not quite as nimble as she once was and it is, sometimes, a challenge to get to the bathroom on time. She is also spending more time in her wheelchair. this product promised extra absorbency and limited leaking and delivered neither. They are useless. we have been putting pads in them which addresses the absorbency issue and helps reduce the leaking. The cut is weird, almost a French leg, high cut. My mother successfully used other versions by this company but this one is an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy again
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Depends or Always briefs, as the rise is long enough to come up at least near my waist ! They are comfortable. Only minus is that they can leak between the legs, but Idk of a design that won't, it's just inherent in trying to cover the anatomy there.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Fan

customer_reviews.title: Wife is hard to fit.
customer_reviews.text: The issue is with the body of the person using them. First, it was a challenge to decide on the right size. There are at least two methods to size the fit, and they seem to conflict if one is on the border of sizes. Second, the legs are too wide for the belly measurement, so they leak at the leg. The latter is a physiological issue, not product quality. If there was a way to cinch the legs, I am sure they would be outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesey Juryrigger

customer_reviews.title: Leak,thin uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Must have made thinner. Used to order often. I have M.S. and am in power chair 24/7. Use these with under pads front and back. The Prevail underware leak. I even use a bladder control pad ! Usually I just have to change that. Have 3 1/2 packs of these I'll never use
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Jamma

customer_reviews.title: Not as descipted
customer_reviews.text: This product claims it is extra absorbent but my mother has been having issues all week with wetting through all her garments. The supplier does not take returns and I need to replace with new product that works. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I was purchasing briefs size S/M, for my elderly ...
customer_reviews.text: I was purchasing briefs size S/M, for my elderly mother from Costco. I was the smallest size they carried. She is only 84 lbs. and these were too big for her and would leak. When hospice came on board, they supplied Prevail briefs and they worked (Small/Youth). Now that hospice has left, I started buying these off of Amazon by the case. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bed wetters
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buying again... my son is ten years old and wets to bed often... he grew out of good nights so i figured id try a xs incontinence diapers... my son is about 4'9 and around 75-80lbs they fit him perfect.... and they don't leak!!! I recommend 100% for young boys that are deep sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer allen

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pull ups so far.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having medical issues and need to be certain that my clothes are protected from incidents [ and also accidents]. These are the best that I have tried so far, and am reording a second package of 56. They come in 4 packages, and are shipped in one large box, very discretely. Yes, I am reording; I would and have recommended them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great in-between size for big kids/teens
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that is bigger than the Goodnites size L/XL and adult sized pull ups. Great price and absorbent enough for daytime use for my son. I'm guessing we'll be able to use them until he's at least 100 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Littleboyzblue

customer_reviews.title: HEY GUYS !  If you like wearing womens lacy panties then buy this product !
customer_reviews.text: I give a one star rating because of the inaccurate & incomplete representation on the seller's product page. I understand the meaning of unisex. I did not see anything on the seller page about the product having a female lacy type construction; The item is also quite flimsy outside of the absorbency pad.After seeing and experiencing one of the four packages I already ordered another product; the remaining three packages will be donated or given to some nice senior lady who would appreciate having them. Discussted !
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Great for day time usage
customer_reviews.text: These are a great general option for daytime usage. I have an 11yr old son who wears the size "Youth/Small Adult". These work great during the day. I double them up at night and he still overflows about half the time. I have found this to be an issue with most incontinence underwear or pull-ups, however. I would recommend them to friends and family. They are strong enough he doesn't rip them while pulling them up like some other brands, yet I can still tear the sides on purpose for easy removal. They don't seem to be too thick or sweaty for him in our hot and humid location.
customer_reviews.author: naturallyjacque

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I was using pads for bladder leakage and the rehab center used these for me when I broke my hip. I have been using them ever since. they cost more than pads but they are much more effective as well as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: carmen o'connor

customer_reviews.title: Not the best wicking I've seen for a diaper but for a pull up pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Well, the back feels like it should be the front and the front is a little Beg. I wish the but area was a little wider for comfort reasons. When he sat down on the edges for too long it doesn't feel very nice. And if you only PA small amount it does every have a wicking ability is but A minute for the diaper to absorb. After while the wicking just stops I was and all of that just to wear them it's super council super stretchy and yeah
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old autistic son wears theses
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has autism and we were looking for a good small adult diaper that wasn't an arm and a leg. These are pretty good. They fit well and are easy to get on and off. Though I do wish they held just a little bit more pee. He is a heavy pee-er and maybe1-2 times a week he'll pee right threw these. Normally it happens right after a big meal or when he first gets up. Though that is a lot better then most I have tried for the price range. They are the best I found and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great for seniors
customer_reviews.text: Physical rehab facility used this brand. When a relative went home after rehab, she needed to use some disposable diapers. I did a quick check online, comparing different brands, like Depends, and this brand seemed to be at the top of the list. Ordered them for my relative, she is eternally grateful. They work.
customer_reviews.author: Ronando

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as the old ones. . . .
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike the new diapers. Loved the old ones. These are not as comfortable (pinch my thighs) seem smaller and definitely not as absorbent. Why must you tinker with a perfectly good product until you get it wrong????
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Finally Prevailed With Prevail.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Prevail Underwear for my grandmother after several trial efforts with various brands and styles. She says "finally." At 90 she was concerned about going out with her mobility slowing down from her younger days. She tells me that these are very much like her regular underwear not bulky at all she has more confidence going out with us again. This is what we were hoping this product is exactly what we were looking for. Grandmother would( and has already actually) recommend Prevail to others.
customer_reviews.author: Her Royal Peepness Princess HoneyBunny BlayzeTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality control
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years for my son with special needs. I’ve been happy until a few months ago. Lately they have been consistently defective...they are not stitched (for lack of better word) at the seams and they fall apart...which can be very messy! I will be looking into another pull-up for my son.
customer_reviews.author: TUTI. S

customer_reviews.title: Not that absorbent...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 7 year old son. He only has issues at night. The first night he wore one and it barely absorbed anything. The second night he wore two and that worked better but still massive leaking. So the third night he wore three of these to bed, I do not recommend this because they get bulky and uncomfortable but none the less this was the magic number. This night there was no leaking. But it is not practical to have to wear three of these. I will be searching for a more superior product.
customer_reviews.author: cb24

customer_reviews.title: A Good Fit!
customer_reviews.text: A good product. Has a good fit and yet allow you to reach areas you need to. It is product I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before for Dad there was never a problem . This last order they crumbled and fell apart dropping bits of the absorbent material all down his pant leg to the floor . These are more expensive than some disappointing . Wont order again .
customer_reviews.author: Grammashe

customer_reviews.title: Very Little Coverage
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. The absorbency might not bad if was more than a thin strip in the front or back, but we'll never know bc everything just leaks out. (Front and back). My dad is 5'11" and 131 pds and these barely cover him in the front, and cover nothing in the back. It's like a diaper thing.
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Less Absorbant than needed for us
customer_reviews.text: Not as absorbant as we had hoped. Reported to the company, and was offered 70% refund and we can keep the product. We will donate to Human services. Certainly they will come into use for someone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbent enough for my 10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Great value but not able to withstand the sheer quantity I needed for proper leak protection with my 10 yr old. It gets overwhelmed. But then, he is 10 lol
customer_reviews.author: Tamsha

customer_reviews.title: Not as absorbent as described.
customer_reviews.text: They are NO where as absorbent as even the Walmart brand. Now I'm stuck with a case of non-refundable, unusable adult incontinence underwear that I can't wear without being totally embarrassed. Don't buy them unless you only need a slight amount of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Torzynski

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be just ok. We actually switched to Depends flex fit. My husband finds them more comfortable, absorbent, and better constructed for quality and leak protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were the worse one I have ever purchased. Says extra absorbent, barely a wet and it leaks like a sieve. Awful I will never recommend these to anyone. Wish I could return them and get my money back so I can order what I normally order that actually dont leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sischo555

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: If Depends or Always work for you in fit and/or absorbency- stick with them. Low level absorption, leak everywhere, uncomfortable, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: The diapers tear very easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst diapers i have ever used. They are stiff and scratchy. They ripped as soon as i put them on. I thought at first it was just the first one i used but the second one did the same. I was looking for a diaper that I could comfortably use. It's hard enough as an adult to have to use diapers but to not be able to use it because it rips or just won't hold up is harder. There are cheaper and more comfortable diapers out there that hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: picture does not match product
customer_reviews.text: look at picture and the box delivered I don't know what this is but it is but it is in correct when will we get our Prevail
customer_reviews.author: Pete Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does not show
customer_reviews.text: This product provides protection with confidence and does not show through clothing. It is snug and does not bite the legs and does not create rash. Highly recommend the product and purchase with monthly delivery not only gives a discount but ensure you do not run out and have to run to the store. Complete privacy in shipping and wonderful Amazon lets you know it has arrived. Great for providing needed products for elderly loved ones that do not live near you... the gift that keeps on giving :)
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT FOR SMALL ADULT
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THESE FOR A PETITE RELATIVE WHO HAD TROUBLE FINDING PROTECTION FOR HER SIZE. SHE IS EXTREMELY PLEASED WITH THEM.
customer_reviews.author: VJOANNE

customer_reviews.title: High Comfort Incontinence Underwear Fits Well for Most Ladies
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft, airy, medium absorbancy incontinence underwear that works great if your patient complains about "too tight" or "too hot" when using drugstore versions like Depens. It is similar in texture to "Always" brand. Highly recommended for daytime use whn patient can be changed every couple hours. May not have sufficient capacity if left on overnight, for high leakage patients.
customer_reviews.author: 5th Finger of Death

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great value for how many you get. However, they are very rough on the sensitive parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comforable
customer_reviews.text: I love these underwear because they keep me dry at night and when I wake up sometimes I just can't hold it and these underwear have proven they have super absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Martie K

customer_reviews.title: Better then Depends!
customer_reviews.text: Prevail fits so much better and is comfortable then what I was using! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same product that I ordered previously ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product that I ordered previously the material has changed it does not fit the way it used to
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Nabors

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbance not great.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, however not as absorbing as my husband would like but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: An ok product
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok product but Amazons brand called Solimo is the pull up on Amazon in our trial and its individually wrapped and the best absorbancy. Its better than Depends brand and is the cheapest price on Amazon we found.
customer_reviews.author: kevin ward

customer_reviews.title: Very very thin.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed not thick at all, requires an additional pad. Not good for overnight. Very very thin. Not returnable item.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zavattieri

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These are the only briefs my husband who suffers from Parkinson’s will use. The others are too tight in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Betty

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, must change too often.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Need to use 33% more of these than the Depend product.
customer_reviews.author: Indo Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap! If I could give it a negative rating I would. If worn for any length of time, the liner comes apart and the fill starts falling out. Save your money . Don't buy this loser of a product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Lighter weight but more effective. More comfortable than the big names.
customer_reviews.author: Danise

customer_reviews.title: large enough
customer_reviews.text: love them the extra size is great for me since I am either bed confined or wheelchair confine
customer_reviews.author: dorothy aspegren

customer_reviews.title: SHHHHH...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nobody likes to talk about this. Discrete packaging/shipping. Invisible when worn. No One needs to know.
customer_reviews.author: Rob & Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am always pleased with the packaging and quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: Christie Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Tiny customer !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a neighbor. She is very tiny. We had a hard time finding youth/ small women's underwear. Women's small fell off of her these hit the spot & kept her dry!! HOORAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Queenmotherofny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Some leakage, but we had trouble getting the size. Small was too small, med was too big. He said they are comfortable and don't make a sore area- skin protection works. Bowel accidents were mostly contained.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price and value
customer_reviews.text: After months I was finally able to speak my dad into trying them while he was in the hospital now with full blown dementia I bought him 2000 pairs hopefully he will outlive what I got him Sadley it does not look like it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The product is well priced and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Make sure that the product selection suits your condition. I have used the for several years now. I am sure that I will upgrade to a product that meets the changing condition.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I brought these diaper for my nine year son with Autism, who's 97lbs. I was expected at first because the diaper was so thin. But it works well. I don't have the change him in the middle of the night anymore. It doesn't leak out from the sides. I'm happy with them. Plus it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: I buy these every month and the price keeps going ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every month and the price keeps going up when i reorder the price is suppose to be 38.99
customer_reviews.author: Judith Pullman

customer_reviews.title: DONT BOTHER!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands and this one is probably the worst. Very lightweight, but doesn't absorb much at all. Stay away from this product if you have incontinence issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They used these at the senior care place my mom went to so we kept using them. Seems to work well except for fecal incontinnance
customer_reviews.author: Irish3

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. Great fit, maximum absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barnes

customer_reviews.title: dont  fit as good as before
customer_reviews.text: why did they change the size of it for? There way smaller than the one's I was getting in the past. Prevail needs to check out there size template's , something isn't the same. Guess I'll be shopping for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mueller

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that what I love the most is the price
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that what I love the most is the price! This brief works great for my mom on a daily basis(I double it up at night) - could be a bit more tight around the legs...but it's no different from the other brands regarding this problem....works great and worth the value for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The size chart is incorrect a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what they’re supposed to hold but it’s not urine.
customer_reviews.text: Should be zero stars. My kid blew through these in 30 minutes and now I’m stuck with four bags.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Mom

customer_reviews.title: it is so wonderful to be able to order this product online for ...
customer_reviews.text: it is so wonderful to be able to order this product online for my 94 year old auntie. she is an invalid and this is the product she likes. it is easy for her to put it on due to the stretchy sides, and it seems to stay in place while other products she has used make her look like a lowrider after a couple hours. and she says the prevail extra absorbency are more comfortable and last longer, iygmd. but it is hard to find it in local stores. and also more expensive. so it is really great for me to "travel" to amazon to buy this for her!
customer_reviews.author: Beignet

customer_reviews.title: They work and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these pull ups. They are comfortable. They are great
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: good for normal usage
customer_reviews.text: they are good but not heavy enough for me. For most they would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These fit great. 5"2". Very comfortable. easy on and off. Definitely a buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Folkertsma

customer_reviews.title: Prevail Adult Pull up Underwear Rules!
customer_reviews.text: My family member had a hard time with Depend and Tena, the sizes didn't work. But the Prevails stretch more and are more absorbant. Meanwhile, they are slightly less expensive. No spills and no mistakes!! Easy on, easy off. I think they beat all competition. They are regularly used in elder care facilities and hospitals, versus other brands. They rule!
customer_reviews.author: drj

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom she said the fit is great product is soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Donna Steininger

customer_reviews.title: Be Prepared
customer_reviews.text: When you elderly it is almost a must in case you don't wake up or can't wake up fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Vera McHale

customer_reviews.title: 2 boxes unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the products are delivered to my door every month. I do wish that they would come in a single box. Placing my order in a box WITHIN ANOTHER BOX is for my an unnecessary waste of a package ie... more trees 😞
customer_reviews.author: Butterbean

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable and weird sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The size chart for the product is inaccurate. I bought it using the chart but ended up being too small for the person even though they weigh right in the middle of the range. Also, this product is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: celeena

customer_reviews.title: Fit finally for my Dad!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something for my dad. He is 6'7, 245 lbs. This size fits perfectly He was having issues with the tightness around his leg and the absorbency on the others were not good. These are perfect for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: finaly found a brand that FITS
customer_reviews.text: easy to pull up. Large size is perfect fit for me. I tried depends extra large depends ,they were too tight??? You should try a few brands before you commit to a large order.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schaller

customer_reviews.title: This item was the perfect fit for my very petite friend
customer_reviews.text: This item was the perfect fit for my very petite friend.. They did not carry this size in my local stores. Thank you.....
customer_reviews.author: Sandy R.

customer_reviews.title: Prevail Protective Underwear
customer_reviews.text: This protective underwear lives up to its package descriptions, and is worn by my mother, who has very sensitive skin. She weighs @130, and wears the medium, super absorbency, skin smart underwear. There are 20 in each package.It is an extremely absorbant, non-irritating product, and there is no odor. The fit is good, as well, and the color is always white. Shipment is once a month through Amazon's subscribe and save. It is easy to add packages, or to cancel the month's shipment. The convenience of this is one of my life's joys. And it is a joy for my mom to have comfortable, non-latex, absorbant underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Ok pad but not thick enough.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly parents. The medium was too small for my mom, who normally wears a Walgreens/CVS large in pullups. However my dad wears a small/medium and the medium of these pullups was fine. However the thickness was not as good as the Walgreens/CVS store brands. Will not be repurchasing as I need a thicker pad.
customer_reviews.author: D Gill

customer_reviews.title: Droopy Drawers
customer_reviews.text: With XL Depend Underwear as my standard, but suddenly unavailable, I bought my Father a case of the XL Prevail. An image forever branded on my brain is the paramedics picking him up off the floor - his underwear staying up around his waist and the absorbent pad part stretching down to his knees. I've helped him to the bathroom many a time, in various conditions with the Depend underwear, but never experienced anything like that. Could be just a difference in the 2 Products' definition of XL or more likely, differences in the construction of the disposable underwear.
customer_reviews.author: mcvitie2

customer_reviews.title: Beige is in
customer_reviews.text: My mother used them and they fit her really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tares

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work for Us
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for us. Crotch too narrow; leg openings too large; padding too thin.
customer_reviews.author: LizE

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids bedwetting!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 98 pound 9 year old with bed wetting problems. Worked wonderfully and cost us half the price of the kids nighttime underwear! No leaks!
customer_reviews.author: FoxyReba

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable product
customer_reviews.text: We were not satisfied at all with this product was very uncomfortable for my mother and we paid good amount of money for them wish we could get refunded she is not going to use them at all
customer_reviews.author: marco antnio reyes

customer_reviews.title: Order these for my mother-in-law every 3 weeks. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Order these for my mother-in-law every 3 weeks. She is tiny and these are the only adult diapers I have found that fit well. And reordering is a breeze with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G. Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: If you like leaky diapers these are for you.
customer_reviews.text: These things leak. So if you love cleaning up urine, these are the diapers for you. Thanks to them, we now have rugs, furniture, blankets and more that have been soaked in pee. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: They did not seem very absorbent. The elastic around the legs were not snug enough to prevent leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Husband has Parkinson and easy to put on for him
customer_reviews.author: Sharon howe

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They ship straight to the house. No having to go out and get them at the store which is great! Price is great for 4 packages. You can’t go to the store and get that many for this price. They can hold a lot too. If you can’t get to the bathroom in time, you don’t really have to worry about it coming through your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea McPherson

customer_reviews.title: The fast delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and the delivery was faster than expected
customer_reviews.author: Clifton E. Deal

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My son has been suffering from Encopresis (constipation and incontinence) since a young age. I am so glad that I can get what he needs through Amazon. No more worries about going to the stores and wondering if these items fit him. I have fought hard with the insurance company about covering this item due to his medical condition. To no avail, it was a lost cause. Thank you for the discount and making the product affordable. I appreciate the timely deliveries from Amazon. This is the best online shopping company ever!
customer_reviews.author: Nayowemepea

customer_reviews.title: works well for #1
customer_reviews.text: sizes seem to run a little small. if you are near the top of the size range you may want to try the next size level. Wish they offered a sample size in smaller quantities.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit large so I order a size down they are the best
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Far more comfortable than other brands
customer_reviews.text: We've tried every product and these are by far the favorite! Quick prime shipping is ideal, too.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Soft, absorbent, although the pant is somewhat small so it does not have the capacity of some others. More comfortable than pants that are more diaper-like with sticky-tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No Good for 6 ft. man weighing 225
customer_reviews.text: These are like bikinis. Easy to put on but leave a lot of bottom uncovered. A bad buy!
customer_reviews.author: rcmcg

customer_reviews.title: they were a great fit for my child who weighs 120 lb
customer_reviews.text: This product leaked all over the place. I bought them for my child who has a disability. Besides then leaking, they were a great fit for my child who weighs 120 lb.
customer_reviews.author: B Baker

customer_reviews.title: Back to depends...
customer_reviews.text: This product against Depends really doesn’t add up as far as holding water.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ringo

customer_reviews.title: Always does the job and I would strongly recommend this brand to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these diapers on a monthly basis for my elderly mother. Always does the job and I would strongly recommend this brand to everyone! Thank you for the speedy delivery! M.D.
customer_reviews.author: mica

customer_reviews.title: All around quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is not absorbent. Pants rip when pulling them up. Bought four packs...no refund🤨
customer_reviews.author: sandra reese

customer_reviews.title: pull ups
customer_reviews.text: these fit my 6ft 300lb disabled son well and have become the only one he will wear. he calls them "green". please do not change the color of these or his ocd will make it very difficult for him to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: lorna f.

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money and get a better product.
customer_reviews.text: These are not worth the money. They are thin and are sized small. Usually my mother wears an XL. This XL didn't fit her. Spend a little more money and get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

product_meta.title: Prevail Incontinence Protective Underwear, Extra Absorbency, Youth/Small Adult, 88 Count
product_meta.description: Size:Youth/Small Adult (88 Count)Designed for extra leakage protection, Prevail Underwear features Comfort-Shape Plus with gentle elastics that shape to your body for a more comfortable and discreet fit than standard adult diapers. The cloth-like outer cover is soft and comfortable for all-day wear while ventilated waist panels allow air to pass through, reducing heat buildup and promoting healthy skin. Prevail Underwear is the #1 rated brand in the healthcare industry. Each product is constructed with a discreet core technology that allows for thinner, highly-absorbent material that enables the user to move more freely and confidently. Combined with a super absorbent polymer for dual protection, Odor Guard technology is proven to reduce the total amount of odor-causing ammonia formed during and after use. Moisture is quickly locked in upon contact for added leakage protection while the soft outer fabric provides additional all-day comfort. Youth/Small Adult size fits waist sizes 20 to 34 inches for a snug and comfortable fit. Each Prevail incontinence product features a proprietary Quick Wick layer of material with MaxSoft Technology that provides advanced softness with rapid liquid absorption for optimal product performance. This package includes four packs of underwear with 22 pairs per package for a total of 88 individual pairs of disposable underwear. Prevail adult care products are manufactured in Pennsylvania with attention to quality, safety, sustainability, and responsible sourcing practices by First Quality, a family-owned company. First Quality is a leader in developing premium quality products. In addition to our collection of adult care products, we also offer lines of baby products, feminine care, paper products, and bottled water.
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM PROTECTION: These Extra Absorbency briefs feature Comfort-Shape Plus with gentle elastics that shape to your body for a more comfortable & discreet fit. Youth/Small Adult fits waist sizes 20 to 34 inches.
COOL COMFORT: Skin Smart Fabric helps protect skin with vitamin E, aloe & chamomile. Breathable Zones allow air flow to help skin stay cool, & cloth-like outer cover is silky soft & comfortable.
RELIABLE & DISCREET BLADDER LEAKAGE PRODUCTS: We offer discreet & comfortable protection with underwear, pads, briefs, bed pads, & belted shields for adult incontinence & post-partum bladder leakage.
COMFORT & INNOVATION: We spent decades working with users & healthcare professionals to develop adult diapers & incontinence underwear that offer discreet comfort & absorbency & support skin health.
TRY OUR QUALITY: Prevail is a leader in advancing new technologies for greater protection, comfort, skin health & wellness. Our commitment to quality & innovation is evident in every product we make.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
